name: Brighten Up 3% TXA Dark Spot Toner with Azelaic Acid
about: What it is:¬†A brightening 3% TXA (tranexamic acid) toner that‚Äôs clinically proven to reduce the look of dark spots in just 7 days, gently resurfaces and evens skin with azelaic acid and 5% PHA, and is suitable for all skin types and tones...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- 3% TXA (Tranexamic Acid): Visibly brightens and reduces the look of dark spots..- 5% PHA (Gluconolactone) and Azelaic Acid: Visibly evens tone, smooths texture, and gently exfoliates..- Upcycled Tangerine Peel: A hydrating nature-derived antioxidant...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This brightening toner is formulated with a triple-threat dark spot solution that‚Äôs clinically proven to reduce the look of dark spots in just seven days and improve visible hyperpigmentation including post-acne marks, melasma, and sunspots. 3% TXA (tranexamic acid) visibly fades stubborn spots while azelaic acid and 5% PHA visibly refine skin texture and brighten for a smooth, even complexion...It‚Äôs suitable for all skin types and tones and layers well into your existing routine including other acids...Clinical Results: Based on clinical and consumer panel testing on 36 subjects after 7 days:.- Clinically proven to visibly reduce dark spots.- 97% agreed skin clarity was improved..Based on clinical and consumer panel testing on 34 subjects after 8 weeks:.- 100% showed visible reduction in dark spots.- 100% showed improvement in skin tone evenness.- 97% showed visible reduction in the look of hyperpigmentation...Clean at Sephora.Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing on effectiveness.
ingredients: -3% TXA (Tranexamic Acid): Visibly brightens and reduces the look of dark spots..-5% PHA(Gluconolactone) and Azelaic Acid: Visibly evens tone, smooths texture, and gently exfoliates..-Upcycled Tangerine Peel: A hydrating nature-derived antioxidant....Water/Aqua/Eau, Gluconolactone, Pentylene Glycol, Isopentyldiol, Tranexamic Acid, Betaine, Propanediol, Azelaic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Sinensis Peel Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Allantoin, Polyglycerin-6, Inulin, Fructose, Glucose, Xanthan Gum, Cellulose Gum, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Cellulose....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Swipe onto a clean face, morning and/or evening, avoiding your eye area..-Do not rinse..-Follow with serum or moisturizer.-For daytime use, follow with sunscreen...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse out any remaining product..-Separate glass bottle and stopper..-Recycle glass bottle and outer packaging..-Send the cap and stopper to Farmacy to be recycled via TerraCycle¬Æ.

reviews.review_text: If I could give minus star, I would. Just 2 or 3 uses pf this product made my cheeks itchy and reddish in color and it evolved like a rash. My skin is not usually a sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I left my comfort zone buying this product. I was used to drugstore toners that come in big bottles for very cheap, so I was hesitant to spend so much for so little product. I will never go back to drugstore toner. This little bottle has lasted me almost a year, and it really works. It has noticeably lightened up dark spots on my face, and dries quickly so I can get on with my skincare routine. highly recommend!

I love this because it‚Äôs so easy to apply and can be layered under other creams. reviews.review_text: Definitely cleared up my hyperpigmentation but caused some pimples and zits

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the dispenser and how it allows for controlled drops at a time. BUT this product broke me out in hives overnight. I know it was this product because all the other products I used were ones I used before. I had to use hydrocortisone cream on my face this morning to deal with the red, angry skin it left me with.  Afterwards I double checked the ingredients online and realized I may have forgotten to do that before, and found that nearly half the ingredients were citrus based. Citrus based ingredients are a common allergen for people, though it's not uncommon to find a little citric acid at or near the bottom of an ingredient list, list product has a LOT of citrus based ingredients, both in number of ingredients AND amounts it seems. I don't think I've ever seen this much of a common allergen so prevalent in a formula. Granted, I should have checked the ingredient list first like I usually do, but I also think it's an obscene amount of citrus product and possibly not formulated well for skin to accept it. Keep in mind I HAVE used Vitamin C serums before, but the vitamin c in those has been better formulated for skin so I didn't have much trouble with it. Beware if you have sensitive skin or ANY kind of citrus allergy/sensitivity. Note: I couldn't get a good picture that showed the reaction justice due to lighting, and this is also several hours after I already applied the hydro cream to sooth it, but there are a lot of little whitehead-like bumps and blotchy redness and bigger red bumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was genuinely amazed by this toner. I never considered a toner to be a necessary part of my skincare routine. However, after struggling with acne scars and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation for a year, I thought I would give this a try and I'm so glad I did! I've been using it twice daily, alongside my other skincare products. I've been using it for about 6 months consistently and I've noticed a huge improvement to my skin texture! My acne marks are almost faded and my skin feels better than ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this Farmacy brightening toner from Sephora a few days ago. I have used it twice and have noticed a rash and pimples on the areas applied. I only applied it on my cheeks and chin, and there are bumps and pimples. I do not have a comprimised skin barrier, as I use hydrating products and no actives. I have dry, acne prone skin and wanted to clear a couple of dark spots. This did not work for me, as I returned it after using it for 2 days. Good luck on your journey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product started off fine. I have been using it for a few months. So far I noticed no difference what so ever. This is fine, not everything works so I didnt bother with a review. However! Its eating my skin off. I do use this properly per the directions. I only use it at night, I do not go out in the sun with this product on my face and I do not use any other products with acids in them. I now have a few spots where the skin just opened like I took a layer off. It bleeds. I stop using the toner, they go away, I start again and the sores come back. Im not sure whats in this since I have been using products (different brand) like these for a few years. I will not be purchasing this again.

reviews.review_title: Does anyone smell acetone? Or just me?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don‚Äôt know what to say. I wanted to love this at first, but it made my nail polish look dull from touching the cotton pad and I swear I keep getting a whiff of acetone. I‚Äôm baffled by a product that is supposed to be clean and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Have been using this toner + the vitamin c serum from this line and it has done more for my acne than dermatologist prescribed retinol (was on Winlevi and it made my skin worse). I was able to see a difference in my skin‚Äôs texture on my forehead with the first week of use. And my dark marks on my jawline had faded significantly over the last 30 days. I have oily acne prone skin that was deemed to be hormonal. But when using hormonal acne-based creams from my dermatologist, it caused  painful cystic acne (6/02/24 picture) so I switched to the Farmacy‚Äôs brand and seen about 20-30% improvements within the first 7 days. No more random weekly jawline breakouts. They have a mini version of this toner now, I‚Äôd definitely start off with that one to see how your skin like it‚Äôs first. I also use a benyzol peroxide face wash and let my face air dry for a few minutes before applying the toner and vitamin c serum in the AM & PM  & it‚Äôs be great for my skin so far !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING!! I suffer from bad acne scarring and this toner has reduced them so much. I use it everyday and it is a thicker consistency, but if you wait before layering on serums or moisturizers, you‚Äôll be good to go!

My skin is very reactive and sensitive but I have not had any problems since starting this product. Only great results. I would recommend!

reviews.review_text: This product takes time to work for sure. I had 2 dark, almost purple post acne marks under my lip, and I used this twice a day in conjunction with a vitamin c serum. In 3 weeks, the marks have faded very noticeably to where I almost don't see them. My skin can also be very reactive and this did not trigger any sensitivity. Highly highly recommend, but also advise patience while waiting for results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't really leave reviews but wanted to for this product.  This is the first product I've used from Farmacy and I really like it.  I've been wanting to try tranexamic acid for a while and finally found a good product with it, azelaic acid, and PHA.  All three together are a powerhouse and I can already see how much brighter my face looks.  It's too early to see any difference in my dark spots but I can definitely see a glow to my face.  I can also see that it works in calming down the few acne spots I have and does well in removing any left over make up that my cleanser didn't remove.  Overall, I do like this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *Honest non sponsored review* I am a big fan of deep sweep from farmacy, so much so it had a promo where this product came with it for free, so I bought 3 gift sets.  I tried the brighten up toner for a few days but I have so many other products, I kind of forgot about it‚Ä¶  Fast forward to a week ago, I noticed my skin was looking dull and textured, post acne spots and all, come to realize I don‚Äôt really have anything for that ( and I have everything lol) until I remembered this toner.  And so I hoped on the Sephora app and did some research, come to find this can help!  It has been 4 days, my pores look smaller, my skin much more even, hydrated, glowing, and dark spots? Well they are fading!  3 months I‚Äôve had this product sitting on a shelf to finally realize I cannot live without it!  Farmacy, even tho your packaging does not stand out like others out there, even if you only have a small shelf at the back of the store to showcase your line, let me tell you something, whatever it is you are doing keep doing it, you‚Äôve changed my skin for the better, thank you xo

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using this product for probably a year now and I will never go without it.   At first, I thought it was a gimmick. I had noticed a change but was using several other new products at the time so I figured it was the other products.   Boy, was I wrong. After I stopped using it briefly, I noticed an instant change in my face. I broke out more, my face textured changed. So I went back on it again. I will NEVER go without it. My face has never been better (granted I‚Äôve had a green peel and micro needling done as well in the past) but this is the best consistent product I‚Äôve used for my acne.   100000% worth it, just be patient with the results!

reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm a healthcare worker still required to wear masks in my workplace and after several years of this my skin has developed cystic acne and in return dark spots. I‚Äôve tried many products with limited effect. I purchased this product on a whim and it‚Äôs fantastic.
